## git-issue-ref unlink

Removes the commit-msg hook

### Synopsis


Removes any active commit-msg hook

```
git-issue-ref unlink
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.git-issue-ref.yaml)
```
